jacquard_fabrics_description: Intricately patterned fabrics in silk and blends. A beautiful selection for special occasions
satin_fabrics_description: Popular fabrics for all occasions, our range has a wide variety in silk, blends and more.
silk_prints_description: The trendiest prints you can find anywhere! Browse our collection today.
laces_description: Delicate and Intricate Lace fabrics from all over the world.
french_laces_description: Famous for their delicacy and craftsmanship, with different patterns,techniques and fibres.
3D_laces_description: Laces with beads, sequins, appliques and many more interesting embellishments, these laces are decadent in their beauty.
metallic_laces_description: Made with metallic thread in the base or as embroidery, these laces are always in trend.
the_suiting_collection_description: Our Collection of the world's finest fabrics For suiting and shirting
plain_dyed_fabric_collection_description: A Vast Selection Of Solid, Plain Dyed Fabrics In Cotton,Silk and Blends
natural_fabrics_description: Beautiful Fabrics made from 100% Natural Fibres.
wedding_fabrics_description: A collection to make your day beautiful and fulfill your dreams.
spring_summer_description: Our collection of fabrics for Spring/Summer feature the very best in sheer fabrics. Our collection of cotton and other natural fabrics is unsurpassed. We bring to you the best in innovative and trending fabrics from all over the world.
autumn_winter_description: Our collection of fabrics for Autumn/Winter, showcase some of the very finest wool fabrics; the very latest in fashionable jacquards and textured fabrics as well as other luxurious and exclusive fabrics. All these and much more.
what_you_wanna_make: What do you want to make?
